goal: I'm starting a new health routine. Find 'Orgain Organic Protein Powder - Chocolate' on Omnizon and set up a 'Subscribe & Save' delivery for every 2 months. Then, create a recurring bi-monthly calendar event called "Health & Fitness Goal Check-in" for the 1st of the month at 8 AM. Finally, send an email to my accountability partner, samuel.b@fitness.net, with the link to the protein powder and the recurring calendar invitation.

evals.description: Verify that 'Orgain Organic Protein Powder - Chocolate' is subscribed on Omnizon with the correct frequency.
